summary: On the last Wednesday before the spring solstice ushers in the Persian New Year, people set off fireworks following an ancient Zoroastrian tradition. Rouhi, spending her first day at a new job, finds herself in the midst of a different kind of fireworks -- a domestic dispute between her new boss and his wife.
cast: Hamid Farokhnezhad|Hediyeh Tehrani|Taraneh Alidoosti|Pantea Bahram|Sahar Dolatshahi|Houman Seyyedi|Matin Heydarinia|Mehran Mahram|Behshad Sharifian|Forough Ghajabagli
title: Chaharshanbe-soori
